question: How do I reset my password?
answer: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page and follow the instructions sent to your registered email.

question: What is your refund policy?
answer: We offer a full refund within 30 days of purchase if you are not satisfied with the service.

question: How can I track my order?
answer: Use the tracking link provided in your shipping confirmation email to see real-time updates.

question: What is the national animal of India?
answer: The national animal of India is the Royal Bengal Tiger.

question: Do you offer international shipping?
answer: Yes, we ship to over 50 countries worldwide. Shipping fees vary by location.

question: How do I change my account email?
answer: Go to Account Settings, click on 'Profile Info', and update your email address there.

question: Is there a mobile app available?
answer: Yes, our app is available for download on both the iOS App Store and Google Play Store.

question: What payment methods do you accept?
answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay.

question: How do I cancel my subscription?
answer: Navigate to the Billing section in your dashboard and click 'Cancel Subscription'.

question: Can I upgrade my plan later?
answer: Absolutely. You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time from your settings.

question: How do I contact a human agent?
answer: If I cannot help you, type 'Agent' to be placed in the queue for a live support specialist.

question: Is my data secure?
answer: Yes, we use industry-standard AES-256 encryption to protect all user data and communications.

question: How long does shipping take?
answer: Domestic shipping usually takes 3-5 business days, while international takes 7-14 days.

question: What should I do if my item arrived damaged?
answer: Please send a photo of the damage to support@example.com within 48 hours for a replacement.

question: Do you have a physical store?
answer: Currently, we operate exclusively online to provide the best prices directly to our customers.

question: How do I apply a discount code?
answer: Enter your code in the 'Promo Code' box during the checkout process before paying.

question: Can I return an item after 30 days?
answer: Returns after 30 days are generally not accepted unless the product is defective.

question: Is there a student discount?
answer: Yes, verified students receive a 15% discount. Register with your .edu email to claim it.

question: How do I delete my account?
answer: Contact our privacy team at privacy@example.com to request permanent account deletion.

question: Are there any hidden fees?
answer: No, the price you see at checkout includes all applicable taxes and fees.

question: Do you offer gift wrapping?
answer: Yes, you can select the gift wrap option during checkout for an additional $5.

question: How do I change my shipping address?
answer: If the order hasn't shipped, you can update the address in your 'Recent Orders' tab.

question: Can I buy a gift card?
answer: Yes, digital gift cards are available in denominations from $10 to $500 on our website.

question: What happens if my package is lost?
answer: If your package hasn't arrived 5 days after the expected date, please contact us for an investigation.

question: Is there a loyalty program?
answer: Yes, our 'Rewards Club' allows you to earn points for every dollar spent.

question: How do I leave a review?
answer: Go to the product page and scroll down to the 'Customer Reviews' section to write your own.

question: Do you restock items?
answer: Popular items are restocked weekly. You can sign up for 'Back in Stock' alerts on the product page.

question: How do I use a gift card?
answer: Select 'Gift Card' as your payment method at checkout and enter the 16-digit code.

question: Can I combine two discount codes?
answer: Only one discount code can be used per order.

question: How do I download my invoice?
answer: Invoices are available for download in the 'Billing History' section of your account.

question: Do you provide bulk discounts?
answer: Yes, for orders over 100 units, please contact our sales team for custom pricing.

question: What are your support hours?
answer: I am available 24/7! Our human team is available Mon-Fri, 9 AM to 5 PM EST.

question: Is there a free trial?
answer: Yes, we offer a 7-day free trial for all new premium account signups.

question: How do I enable 2FA?
answer: Go to Security settings and scan the QR code using an authenticator app like Google Authenticator.

question: Can I pause my subscription?
answer: Yes, you can pause your subscription for up to 3 months from the Billing tab.

question: Do you support multiple languages?
answer: I can communicate in over 20 languages! Just start typing in your preferred language.

question: What is the warranty on electronics?
answer: All electronics come with a 1-year limited manufacturer warranty.

question: How do I report a bug?
answer: Please use the 'Feedback' button in the app or email tech@example.com.

question: Can I change my username?
answer: Usernames are permanent, but you can change your display name in Profile settings.

question: Do you ship to P.O. boxes?
answer: Yes, we ship to P.O. boxes via standard postal services.

question: How do I sync my devices?
answer: Log into the same account on both devices, and your data will sync automatically.

question: Is there a referral bonus?
answer: Yes! Refer a friend and you both get $10 in store credit after their first purchase.

question: What is 'Express Shipping'?
answer: Express Shipping guarantees delivery within 1-2 business days for domestic orders.

question: How do I update my credit card?
answer: Go to the 'Payment Methods' section in your account to edit or add new cards.

question: Can I pre-order upcoming items?
answer: Yes, pre-orders are available for select new releases. Check the 'New Arrivals' section.

question: How do I track my refund?
answer: Once approved, refunds take 5-10 business days to appear on your bank statement.

question: Do you have a developer API?
answer: Yes, developers can access our API documentation at developers.example.com.

question: What is your privacy policy?
answer: Our full privacy policy is available at example.com/privacy.

question: Can I exchange an item?
answer: Yes, we offer free exchanges for different sizes or colors within 30 days.

question: How do I find my member ID?
answer: Your Member ID is located at the top of your Profile page under your display name.

question: What is the benefit of a Pro account?
answer: Pro accounts get ad-free access, unlimited storage, and priority customer support.

question: How do I change my language preference?
answer: Go to Settings > General > Language and select your choice.

question: Can I set up family sharing?
answer: Yes, you can share your subscription with up to 5 family members under the Family Plan.

question: Do you offer a non-profit discount?
answer: Yes, registered NGOs are eligible for a 50% discount on all annual plans.

question: Why is my payment being declined?
answer: Check your card balance, expiry date, and ensure international transactions are enabled.

question: How do I link my social media?
answer: Navigate to Settings > Connected Apps to link your Facebook or Twitter account.

question: What is your environmental policy?
answer: We use 100% recyclable packaging and offset our carbon footprint for every delivery.

question: How do I become an affiliate?
answer: Join our affiliate program at example.com/affiliate to earn commission on referrals.

question: Can I get a physical receipt?
answer: We only provide digital receipts to save paper, but you can print them from your email.

question: Is the service available offline?
answer: Certain features like 'Offline Mode' are available on our mobile app for Pro users.

question: How do I reset my API key?
answer: Go to the Developer Dashboard and click 'Regenerate Key' in the API section.

question: Are there limits on file uploads?
answer: Free users have a 10MB limit per file, while Pro users can upload up to 2GB.

question: How do I customize my dashboard?
answer: Click the 'Edit' icon on your dashboard to rearrange or hide widgets.

question: What is 'Priority Support'?
answer: Priority support ensures your tickets are answered within 2 hours during business hours.

question: Can I use the software on multiple computers?
answer: Yes, you can log in on any device, but simultaneous use depends on your plan limit.

question: How do I unsubscribe from marketing emails?
answer: Click the 'Unsubscribe' link at the bottom of any marketing email.

question: Do you have a community forum?
answer: Yes, join our community at community.example.com to discuss features and tips.

question: How do I update the mobile app?
answer: Check the App Store or Google Play Store for the 'Update' button.

question: What is the 'Early Access' program?
answer: It allows users to test beta features before they are released to the general public.

question: Can I pay with Bitcoin?
answer: We currently do not accept cryptocurrency but are looking into it for the future.

question: How do I clear my cache?
answer: Go to Settings > Storage > Clear Cache to free up space in the app.

question: What is your policy on data privacy?
answer: We never sell your data to third parties. Read our full policy at example.com/privacy.

question: How do I set a custom profile picture?
answer: Click on your current avatar in Profile Settings to upload a new image.

question: Can I merge two accounts?
answer: Account merging is not supported at this time for security reasons.

question: How do I change my time zone?
answer: Go to Settings > Account > Timezone to adjust your local time display.

question: Do you offer white-labeling?
answer: White-labeling is available for Enterprise clients. Contact sales for more info.

question: How do I find my purchase history?
answer: Look under Settings > Billing > Order History.

question: Can I download my data?
answer: Yes, use the 'Export Data' tool in the Privacy section of your settings.

question: What is the 'Lite' version of the app?
answer: The Lite version uses less data and storage, ideal for older devices.

question: How do I reactivate a cancelled account?
answer: Log in to your account and follow the prompt to 'Restart Subscription'.

question: Are your products cruelty-free?
answer: Yes, none of our products are tested on animals.

question: How do I set up a business account?
answer: Select 'Business' during the signup process or contact sales to convert an existing account.

question: What are 'Push Notifications'?
answer: These are alerts sent to your device to keep you updated on account activity.

question: How do I block another user?
answer: Go to the user's profile and click the 'Block' icon.

question: Can I get a demo of the software?
answer: Yes, book a 15-minute demo with our product team at example.com/demo.

question: How do I change my notification settings?
answer: Go to Settings > Notifications to toggle specific alert types.

question: What is 'Dark Mode'?
answer: Dark Mode changes the UI colors to reduce eye strain in low-light environments.

question: How do I enable Dark Mode?
answer: Go to Settings > Appearance and select 'Dark'.

question: Can I use the API for free?
answer: We have a free tier with limited requests per month for developers.

question: How do I join a webinar?
answer: Register at example.com/webinars and use the link sent to your email to join.

question: What is your cookie policy?
answer: We use cookies to improve your browsing experience. Learn more at example.com/cookies.

question: How do I report an unauthorized charge?
answer: Contact our fraud department immediately at security@example.com.

question: Can I change my billing cycle?
answer: Yes, switch between monthly and annual billing in your account settings.

question: How do I find my referral link?
answer: Your unique link is located in the 'Refer a Friend' tab of your dashboard.

question: What is 'Two-Factor Authentication'?
answer: It's an extra layer of security requiring both your password and a mobile code.

question: How do I add a team member?
answer: Go to the 'Team' tab and enter your colleague's email address to invite them.

question: Can I export my chat logs?
answer: Yes, click 'Download Chat' at the end of any conversation with me.

question: How do I verify my identity?
answer: Upload a valid ID through the 'Verification' portal in your account settings.

question: What is the 'Holiday Schedule'?
answer: Our human support is offline on major holidays like Christmas and New Year's Day.

question: How do I give feedback?
answer: Rate your experience at the end of this chat or use the 'Feedback' form in our footer.
